Judul: ANALYZING THE CREDIT RISK ON INDONESIAN MORTGAGE - KPR and KPA (CASE OF YEAR 2003 - 2008)
Abstrak: In Indonesia, Kredit Pemilikan Rumah (KPR) and Kredit Pemilikan apartment (KPA) is one of the most consumers' favorite product in  purchasing house and apartment because it provides installment payment system which could be aligned with the consumer's financial capacity  and also interest rate system in several preferences. This research  examined the credit risk that emerged from the KPR and KPA presented  in Indonesia, and also examined the correlation between KPR and KPA  exposure and BI rate towards non-performing loan (NPL) of construction  sector. The data included historical data of KPR and KPA exposure, BI  rate, and property NPL exposure for period 2003 through 2008. Tests and  data analysis in this research are including multiple regression and  Expected Loss calculation, which are believed able to address those  concerns, as mathematic and parametric measurement.
